name: BITCRUSH
description:
Get ready for an action-packed mission into enemy space, to get your general's lunch.

Features:
  • Very fast shoot-em-up gameplay
  • A bunch of levels
  • Upgrades that change up the way you play
  • Friendly hotdog vendors
  • ...and more!

I put alot of love into this game. I hope you like it!

This game is a submission to LOWREZJAM 2020, rate it here! Thank you for playing :)

Controls:

Move - Left and Right

Shoot - Space / Z

Skip -  X

Pause - Esc / P

Credits

Thanks SpaceCastleMusic for making the sound effects!

IG: @spacecastlemusic,  Itch: SpaceCastleMusic

Game, graphics, and music by me, Hamezii.
